Validate the format of the email using a regex pattern.

Returns:

str

Raises:

class main.SchoolManagementSystem[source]

Bases: object

A class used to represent the School Management System.

save_data(filename, data)[source]

Saves the given data to the specified JSON file.

save_data_dump(filename, data)[source]

Dumps the given data directly into the specified JSON file.

static save_data(filename, data)[source]

Save the given data to a JSON file.

If the file exists, it loads the existing data and appends new data. Otherwise, it creates a new file.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – The name of the file to save the data to.

  • data (list) – The data to be saved.

static save_data_dump(filename, data)[source]

Dump the given data into a JSON file, overwriting the existing file.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – The name of the file to dump the data into.

  • data (dict or list) – The data to be saved.

main.add_course()[source]

Retrieves the course information from the entry fields, creates a Course object, and saves it to a JSON file.

Returns:

None

main.add_instructor()[source]

main.add_student()[source]

Retrieves the student information from the entry fields, creates a Student object, and saves it to a JSON file.

None

main.assign_course()[source]

Assigns a course to an instructor and updates the instructor’s data in the JSON file.

Returns:

None

main.display_data()[source]

Displays data about students and instructors in the tree view widget.

Returns:

None

main.load_json(filename)[source]

Loads and returns data from the given JSON file.

Parameters:

filename (str) – The name of the file to load data from.

Returns:

The loaded data.

Return type:

dict or list

main.refreshCourses()[source]

Loads the courses from a JSON file, updates the available courses list, and refreshes the dropdown menu.

Returns:

None

main.register_course()[source]

Registers a course for a student and updates the student’s data in the JSON file.
